meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Soft</kanji> <kanji>prohibition</kanji> isn't going to be as bad as jail or prison. They went soft on you, so you're only under <vocabulary>house arrest</vocabulary>. That's not so bad, right?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
